component.text:
Other worms that have created problems across the Internet:
  • Morris Worm – 1988
  • Melissa Worm (a mass-mailing macro virus) – 1999
  • Love Bug Worm – May 2000
  • Code Red Worm – July 2001
  • SQL Slammer Worm – January 2003
  • Blaster Worm – August 2003
  • Nachi Worm – August 2003
  • MyDoom Worm – January 2004
  • Sasser Worm – April 2004
  • Zotob Worm – August 2005
  • Nyxem Worm – January 2006
  • Storm Worm – January 2007
  • MS RPC 0Day Worm – 2007
  • JTV Worm – June 2008
